entry.title: WIND WARNING, Suffield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:25 a.m. MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers beginning near midnight then changing to periods of snow and a few rain showers before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to periods of rain in the morning and ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Local rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
